Title: Dis Koue Kos, Skat
Writer: Etienne Fourie, Marita van der Vyver
Actors: Bouwer Bosch, Zonika de Vries, Michelle du Plessis, Angelique Gerber
Plot: When Clara Brand discovers that her husband is cheating on her with her friend and colleague, she plots her revenge, all the while juggling new friendships, new romances and the rediscovery of her passion for food.
